subject: Sales
title: The Bow Tie Funnel
description: A quick win: understand The Bow Tie Funnel.

hook.text: Traditional funnels end at the sale. The bow tie adds adoption, expansion, and advocacy beyond it.

buildup.text: The bow tie recognizes that post-sale revenue from upsells and renewals often exceeds the first deal.

discovery.text: Customer success becomes a revenue engine. Happy clients expand accounts and refer new business.

twist.text: Companies measuring only the left side of the funnel leave most lifetime revenue sitting on the table.

climax.text: Track the full bow tie. Invest equally in winning new clients and growing existing relationships.

punchline.text: The sale isn't the end. It's the midpoint.

quiz.question: What does the bow tie funnel add beyond the traditional funnel?
options: Post-sale stages like adoption, expansion, and advocacy
